answerText: Kabbalah and Criticism[10] This work by the author of Kabbalah and Criticism coins the term "School of Resentment" to describe traditions of criticism more concerned with political and social value than aesthetics. It includes the works of Shakespeare, Milton, Whitman and several other authors in the title group.
heading: SUBMIT |2014 | WUSTL, Haverford, Bellarmine A | 14 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question:  [10] Name this 1975 work that analyzes the methods of thinkers like Isaac Luria and argues that they provide a model for modern literary interpretation.
